response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to you, and I understand its importance to your endeavors. I am offering it to you at a special price, reflecting my confidence in its quality and your appreciation for it. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer allows you to secure this valuable asset at a premium but still within a competitive range compared to its market value. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
